title: Need to identify font so I can have video bump made
content:
I am having a company make a video bump for me. My problem is that the guy that made the logo used some random logo generator on a web site and then had a stroke and doesn't remember anything...

The video company is trying to match up the logo. I need to buy the font (if I need to buy one). I just need to get the right one.

Here is where the logo is: worldwidesolutionz.com

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108184755im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo%20(1)_3994.png)

Thanks for any help!!

Larry
author: LPenrod

comments.content:
That does look like it works. I'll have the video guys try that one.

Thanks!
